title.rendered: Mission Control Solution Wins Industry Innovation Award 🏆🏆🏆

content.rendered:
We are so proud and honoured at Mission Control when one of our clients wins a key Industry Award for their product and solution – and we can’t be more excited for our amazing client and the team at Retail Action Crime Kit (RACK) for winning the coveted Innovation Prize in Physical Risk Management from the recent UK Retail Knowledge Awards. 🏆🏆🏆

The RACK Solution – designed and developed by Mission Control – empowers small/independent retailers to record crime incidents quickly and easily through the use of Mobile Apps (on iOS and Android) and to then collate that data into a single Web-based Admin facility providing Retailer managers the ability to immediately report the theft to police.

Great update on the night of the big win from one of clients, Corin Dennison, below:

 

Developing new and exciting solutions across multiple sectors – from Retail to Education to Healthcare and Media – is our bread and butter. We are so excited to continue our work with the RACK Team to further expand this exciting new tool.

We invite you to check out the new Mobile Apps on both iOS and Android – and be sure to read more about the full RACK Retail solution on the RACK Main Website.
